                     User ego)
        Parameters:
        experts -
        seeker -
        Returns:
        list of experts working in same department as ego but never worked with ego.

      • cocitation

        public List<User> cocitation(Set<URI> experts,
                    URI ego)
        use co-citation as an indicator of possible future collaboration
        Parameters:
        experts - set of URIs of qualified experts
        ego - URI of our seeker
        Returns:
        set of URIs of qualified experts, who are co-cited with ego, but not coauthors of ego
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException

        public List<User> birdsOfFeather(Set<URI> experts,
                        User ego)
        Parameters:
        experts -
        ego -
        Returns:
